Question: In 1999, the American Film Institute ranked this person the 18th best male movie star on their AFI's 100 Years...100 Stars list.
Hints: On the sitcom Happy Days, Fonzie has a picture of this person in his closet next to his mirror.
To date, neither of this person's Porsches have been located.
PST, this person spotted a black-and-white 1950 Ford Tutor coupe, driving at a high speed, heading eastbound on Rt.
